summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bloomy Essentials Top 3 Organic Essential Oils Starter Set 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - 100% Pure Lavender, Lemon and Peppermint
Review Date: 2020/02/25
Store: Bloomy Essentials
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemon,Peppermint,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.6 x 1.2 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084567', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'}
Review Text: I use essential oils for many purposes and this 3 piece set is a great starter kit for those who love lavender, lemon and peppermint. They smell great and are very versatile. Mix them with your favorite oil (I like coconut) and apply topically or add a few drops to a diffuser for a peaceful night sleep. I recently had a cold and mixed the peppermint and coconut oil and applied to my chest for a cough. It was soothing and helped with the sinuses as well. Makes a great gift because it comes in a cute little box as well.
Review Title: Nice starter kit
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Folora 4pcs Premium 1 Inch Wide Solid Color Floral Plaid Headband Set for Women Girls, Pink
Review Date: 2020/07/20
Store: Folora
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Brand': 'Folora', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.98 x 5.51 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLR-HB-4pcs Pink'}
Review Text: I ordered the pink headband set and these are really cute styles. The material is good and the band fits my small head well. If your head was on the larger side, they'd stretch but might feel tight behind the ears. They're durable and will keep my hair in place.
Review Title: Small but cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DROP THE BOMB Bbosong Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 15g - Oil Free UVA/UVB Protection Sebum Control Skin Smooth Moisturizing Sunblock Stick Balm without Sticky, Primer before Makeup
Review Date: 2020/08/06
Store: DROP THE BOMB
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '15 Grams', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'DROP THE BOMB', 'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was not able to use this product as intended since it was in several pieces when it arrived. I liked that it was spf50 to protect the skin on my face but unfortunately, I can't use it.
Review Title: Broken in pieces
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/08/14
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Review Text: I need a good face scrub to clean out the pores but it needs to be gentle at the same time to not inflame my skin. This scrub didn't really irritate my skin but the granules in the scrub are very rough. I found it to be more so than other scrubs I've used. Thankfully, it didn't irritate my skin. I just had to be extra gentle. That said, my skin was smooth again so it does work.
Review Title: Interesting texture
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [the SAEM] Derma Plan Cleansing Bubble Pad 15pcs - One Step Gentle Makeup Cleansing Wipes Produce Fine & Dense Bubbles, Hypoallergenic Formula, Pore Clean, Mild Exfoliation
Review Date: 2020/08/20
Store: THESAEM
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'THESAEM', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '15.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.9 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great if you're heading out for a trip. There's 15 pads in a little container so makes it easy to use. The pads clean well and are gentle to use. One step cleaning and easy to tote with you to the gym, plane or wherever you need a clean up.
Review Title: Small travel pack
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK
Review Date: 2020/12/08
Store: HAMUULL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'}
Review Text: These silicone face scrubbers are a little bigger than others I've used but it helps cover my area on my face when cleaning. The little nubs are longer and feel more pointed but these work at giving your skin a little extra scrubbing without injuring the skin. Easy to clean and should be easy to keep clean. Would also work at cleaning your makeup brushes.
Review Title: Good face scrubber
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Here's the purchase data:

    Structure your response as:

    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for versatile, practical products, particularly in the realm of personal care and wellness. Their purchase history indicates a focus on essential oils for holistic uses, emphasizing their utility for relaxation and health. High ratings for items with functional attributes, like skin care and beauty tools, suggest a tendency towards products that offer both performance and ease of use. 

Consistent themes include a blend of beauty and wellness, as they frequently seek items that enhance skin care while also addressing personal health needs. While quality is prioritized – evidenced by good ratings for effective products – the buyer shows moderate price sensitivity, favoring reasonably priced items over premium alternatives, reflecting a search for value.

The individual also displays a liking for aesthetically pleasing items, as shown by the purchase of stylish hair accessories. This dual interest in functionality and style indicates a balanced approach to shopping, valuing both appearance and utility. Overall, the core preferences reveal a practical yet expressive consumer who appreciates quality in everyday products while remaining mindful of cost.

target_interaction.title: Soothing cleanser
target_interaction.text:
Great cleansing lotion for a delicate area. I like that this adds some moisturizing where you might need it and leaves a nice clean feeling. If you want to feel clean
and need a soothing feel left behind, this works great.
target_interaction.title_meta: Doctor Butler's Personal Cleansing Lotion – Safe, Hygienic, & Soothing Lotion for Sensitive Areas, Hygienic Cleansing Lotion for Men and Women to Cleanse, Soothe, and Moisturize (3oz)
features: Doctor Butler's Personal Cleansing PERSONAL HYGIENE AND CARE LOTION: Doctor Butler’s cleansing and moisturizing lotion is a safe, topical cleanser made with natural ingredients. Used with toilet paper, a dime-size drop will cleanse and soothe irritated areas and provide immediate discomfort relief.Lotion for Men and Women

INTIMATE SKIN CARE FOR HIM & HER: Our gentle cleansing lotion works similarly to anorectal and vaginal wipes by gently cleansing and moisturizing personal areas. These are personal hygiene products for women as well as for men, and it’s a cleanser that is safe to use during pregnancy.

CLEANSES AND COMFORTS: Doctor Butler’s cleansing and moisturizing lotion for women and men beats out the leading vaginal and anorectal wipes with a rinse-free, fragrance-free formula that brings instant relief to sensitive areas.

SKIN-SAFE, DOCTOR-DEVELOPED FORMULA: This personal cleansing moisture lotion was developed by proctologists for better down-there care. This bio-enhanced formula is safe on sensitive skin, since it’s made with herbal and plant extracts, minerals, amino acids, and essential oils that hydrate, soothe, and refresh.
RISK-FREE PURCHASE: Doctor Butler's personal cleansing products come with a SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, in any way, you will receive your money back.
